title: Countries with the largest number of cosmetic procedures 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of procedures in each Country on the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Number of procedures and Thailand has the lowest Number of procedures.
There is a difference of 4221744.0 between the maximum Country United States and minimum Country Thailand.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of procedures in the y axis.
The Number of procedures is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Thailand.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of procedures in each Country on the y axis.
